job description:
Responsibilities
  • Identify key technical issues and focus resources to produce cutting-edge technical breakthroughs in the design of machine learning & artificial intelligence algorithms to solve industrial problems in the medical domain;
  • Identify and collaborate with academic institutions, medical institutions and external leaders in machine learning and related fields;
  • Collaborate closely with team members across the USA and China on developing systems from prototyping to production level;
  • Identify industry and academic trends in the areas of machine learning research and industrial applications of ML relevant to the medical field.
Qualification
  • Ph.D./MS with a focus on ECG analysis, machine learning or related fields;
  • Experience working with real biomedical signals, especially ECG data;
  • Understanding of machine learning/deep learning, statistical modeling and time-series analysis;
  • Understanding of signal processing concepts (filtering, Fourier, and Wavelet transforms);
  • Knowledge of state-of-the-art methods coupled with the creativity and intelligence to advance beyond them;
  • Strong algorithmic problem solving and software development skills (Python, Java, C/C++, CUDA, etc.);
  • Experience in deep learning platform including Pytorch/Tensorflow/Torch/Caffe is a plus;
  • Passion for materializing ideas that impact the lives of patients;
  • Outstanding team spirit with excellent communication and writing skills.
